metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to understand a charge on my last bill. It's for $45.99, and I don't recognize it at all. Can you help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Yes, I can certainly help with that. Could you please provide me with your account number or the email address associated with your account so I can look into this for you? I can also see the last four digits of the credit card on file if you'd like to confirm that itâ€™s your card.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my account number is 1234567890. And yes, that is my card. But I'm still confused. It just says 'Miscellaneous Charges.' I literally didn't order anything extra. Is this some sort of hidden fee? That would be really annoying.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me check on this. Unfortunately, our system doesn't give specific details about the miscellaneous charges, only that it's for a third-party service provider. I am unable to find any further details about what the charge is for. However, I can offer you a credit for $45.99 to refund the charge.
